comment.caption: Former President Truman at Future Farmers of America Convention in Kansas City
comment.note: Former President Harry S. Truman in center, surrounded by members of the Future Farmers of America, including (at right) 1953-54 President Billy Parsons. They are at Municipal Auditorium in Kansas City, Missouri. See also photos 2004-174, 2004-215, and 93-200.
